thread.title: Emma Bunton can't believe Brooklyn Beckham is old enough to be BRITs: "I held you as a baby!"
thread.title_full: Emma Bunton can't believe Brooklyn Beckham is old enough to be BRITs: "I held you as a baby!"

author: Lara Martin
title: Emma Bunton can't believe Brooklyn Beckham is old enough to be BRITs: "I held you as a baby!"
text:
Thank you for subscribing!   
Emma Bunton admitted she was feeling a bit old at tonight’s BRIT Awards 2017 after finding out Brooklyn Beckham was also in attendance. 
The Spice Girl joked on ITV2’s after show party that she couldn’t believe Brooklyn was now 17 years old and on the red carpet after remembering giving him cuddles as a newborn. 
“Brooklyn is here!” she said. 
“I’m like, ‘I held you as a baby and now he’s a big man!’ It’s frightening! He looks very handsome.” Emma spoke about Brooklyn on the ITV2 after show programme (Photo: ITV) Brooklyn arriving at the O2 (Photo: PA) 
Brooklyn pictured looking rather dapper on the red carpet at London’s O2 Arena less than a week after suffering a nasty fall while snowboarding. 
He broke his collarbone last week while on a skiing holiday in Whistler, Canada with his famous family. 
The teen beamed for the cameras as he posed for photographers in an oversized coat that neatly covered the sling on his left arm. Brooklyn has a broken collarbone (Photo: PA) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
